intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: It's been so long since I was last in this Deeprealm. How peaceful it is. Now then, where is my daughter?

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: Father, here I am. Welcome back.

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Caeldori, my dear! You've grown even more beautiful while I've been away.

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: Goodness. Please, Father. You're embarrassing me.

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Do I dote too much? Maybe so. You've been well, I hope?

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: Yes, of course. I've kept up with every aspect of my training and studies. And in my spare time, I've memorized several books about war strategy.

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Wow! Impressive. Trying to be perfect, just like your father?

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: I'm aiming for capable. I've never seen real combat yet...

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Take your time, Daughter. Don't rush yourself. The reason my friends and I are constantly at war is to end war.

intro.speaker: Hoshidan
intro.line: Reporting, sir. Urgent news from the other side. Enemies are attacking a site as we speak—you're needed at once.

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: All right. I'll go at once.

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: I'm here too! I can fight, Father!

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: You want to join me?

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: Well, why not? I would learn so much more in actual combat. Besides, don't you need all the help you can get?

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: No, we've got it under control, Caeldori. You're brave to volunteer. I couldn't bear the thought of putting you in harm's way.

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: But, Father!

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Caeldori, don't you worry. My friends are excellent at what they do. And I must say that I approach perfection on the battlefield. Wait here. I'll return as soon as the battle's over.

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: I, um... But...

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: No buts, Caeldori. I'll be back in a jiffy.

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: Oh, Father... Hmmm.

battle.speaker: Subaki
battle.line: How is this possible? They've swarmed this area? Is there no end to them? The odds seem...against us.

battle.speaker: Caeldori
battle.line: I'm sorry. I don't mean to disobey you. But I had to jump at the opportunity!

battle.speaker: Caeldori
battle.line: I want to help! I really, really do! I'm tired of sitting home alone and waiting to be of some use. I'll never be as prefect as you are, Father. But I'd like to start trying to be! I have rigorously trained myself in martial arts, among other disciplines. I won't disappoint you.

battle.speaker: Subaki
battle.line: Caeldori, of course you won't. You seem like quite a wonder already! All right. Stay and fight alongside me. Don't get overconfident though. This is your first battle, after all!

battle.speaker: Caeldori
battle.line: Yes, of course. I'll do my best, Father!

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Almost perfect, Caeldori. I observed your every move. How can you be this good? It was your very first battle!

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Thanks! But you must have seen that I'm still falling short of your standard. Perfect as you are, that is. Oh, what's this? You've torn your clothing, Father! I guess even paragons like you can have a bad day. I'll patch those right up. I'm sure I have a sewing needle among my other things.

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: How...prepared of you.

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Yes. I try. Oh! I also did a quick assessment of the injuries done to the locals. After visiting each and every one, I know that they're all going to be just fine. That us, if we can get them somewhere better for their recuperation. To that end, I've mobilized some of our troops to carry them out of here. I tried to think of what you'd do, basically. Did I catch everything?

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Yep, more or less.

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Well, I also sent a scout ahead to make sure the way is safe. It is. And, I'm sure I wasn't as thorough as you, Father, but I also...

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: ...Also?! Is she outdoing even me?!

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Hey, Father! Hello?

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Hmm. At this rate, Caeldori will soon be more perfect than I am!

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Father? Sorry if I'm boring you...

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Huh? No, of course not dear.

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: I must train harder. I know, I know... Someday I'll be as brilliant in battle as you are, Father. I swear I won’t let you down.

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: I know you won't, Caeldori. Just don't push yourself too hard!

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Ugh! I'd better start pushing myself very, very, very hard. Or else my daughter is going to make me look like a day-one novice!

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Found you! Hello there, Caeldori.

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Goodness, Mother. You startled me. But don't you look impressive! As always. I don't know how you do it.

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Hmm. Well, Caeldori, there's something I suppose I should tell you. When you were young, you looked so much like your father. But now... Time has its way with us.

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: What's that? How odd. Time has its—?

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Um... How do I say this? Do you recall the tales I've told you about my mother?

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Yes. Of course. You've told me much about Grandmother. She was as perfect a knight as has ever been seen. I've always felt that you and Grandmother were so alike!

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: ... Actually, it's YOU that's like my mother. You're her spitting image. By the gods, just look at you. Your face, your voice... The way you carry yourself...every move, every word you say...

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Really? I'd love to think that I'm a little like such a great woman. I'll have to work even harder to honor her memory.

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Well, you're doing fine. But... But... Just don't mess up!

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Yes! I swear I'll do my very best for you, Mother!

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Ha ha! All right, all right... I'm sorry. I didn't mean to overreact. And I promise never to go and die on you. Or abandon you.

end.speaker: Caeldori
end.line: Hmm? What, Mother? Are you being serious?

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Um, well... Let's just forget I said anything, Daughter.
